channel.title: EM on Tianyi Shi (Hideyuki)
channel.description: Recent content in EM on Tianyi Shi (Hideyuki)

item.title: Electron Microscopy and X-Ray Crystallography
item.description:
Learning objectives

To understand the methodological principle of electron microscopy in its different applications (e.g. TEM, SEM, tomography, single-particle), and X-ray crystallography ï‚· To be able to evaluate, which method of structural analysis would be most feasible with which kind of biological specimen (e.g. whole cells, viruses, protein complexes, peptides).

To gain a conception of the resolution ranges attainable by EM methods as compared to X-ray crystallography.

To be aware of the computational methods that combine EM maps and crystallogrographic data
